thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 02 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Roularta FY Revenue Down At 256.8 Million Euros

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Roularta FY Revenue Down At 256.8 Million Euros
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - ROULARTA MEDIA GROUP NV:
* ROULARTA MEDIA GROUP IS CONSIDERING PAYING A € 5.00 INTERIM GROSS DIVIDEND PER SHARE AT THE START OF THE SECOND HALF OF 2018
* FY NET LOSS EUR 13.0 MILLION VERSUS PROFIT OF EUR 20.3 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY REVENUE EUR 256.8 MILLION VERSUS EUR 276.5 MILLION YEAR AGO
* DIFFICULT TO MAKE A FORECAST FOR H1 OF 2018 * FY EBITDA EUR 1.9‍​ MILLION VERSUS EUR 16.9 MILLION YEAR AGO
* ROULARTA ANTICIPATES A SIGNIFICANT POSITIVE NET CASH POSITION AT THE END OF 2018 Source text : bit.ly/2t8Xlfo Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
